languages.name: Javascript
description: I have been working with javascript for 3 years, however in the last two years it is where I have approached this language, through frameworks like React and Vue.js.
In the last eight months I have dedicated myself completely to this language, trying different libraries and integrations with Node.js.

languages.name: Python
description: It was the first language I learned. With that I started to study the concepts of OOP. I started with this language because I wanted to learn to develop video games and in college they recommended me to start with this language.
I do not give much use now, only in exceptional cases that I have to perform some algorithm quickly and I do it in python.

In spite of what I have used a lot in the university, especially to put into practice some things that I was seeing in classes. Example of this I developed a brute force algorithm with a small scheme of information gathering, with the aim of putting some concepts on discrete structures into practice.

languages.name: C++
description: I have a good command of the operation of data structures and memory management thanks to C ++. I love this language, I do not have much to explain with it, it has simply made me very passionate about studying enough concepts on computer science on my own.
Most of the projects I have done in this language have been university projects, including an RSA encryptor and a multiplayer game on the console.

languages.name: Matlab
description: Matlab I learned it in the university, in a course of scientific calculation and later I used it to make algorithms of optimization in linear programming.

languages.name: Php
description: I work for six months in Groowly as fullstack developer. I must to learn codeigniter because the projects of the previuos programmer are made using this framework
I fix some bugs in the existents websites, and develop new sites like:
I made the structure of the data to store in the database and the development of the websites using the designs that the designers give me.

databases.name: Mongo DB
description: I have eight months working with MongoDB and I in love of them. It's very simple work with this using node.js and make restful APIs.

databases.name: MySQL
description: When I started to develop this was the first relational database management system that I used. I learned it in conjunction with php, and I used it in my laravel projects

stacks.name: MERN + GraphQL
description: I recently have been testing GraphQL and now I don't want don't use it in my projects. I think that this amazing tool is very helpful to organize and get specific data from database.

stacks.name: Laravel + React
description: I have a couple of projects using this two technologies, the most important is an admin system for GUIA USB

design: In this area I usually focus very well on the creation and development of the identity of a brand. For me it is very important that the brand transmit correctly the values and that it is seen in the correct way by the target audience. I complement this area with a good UI / UX with the purpose of creating web pages that allow you to have a quite intuitive navigation, a different experience but above all that the webs are functional in every small detail.
development: This is the area in which I enjoy the most, also in which I spend more work because sometimes things do not go as simple as one expects, but in the end I love doing this.

Desktop applications, apps for Android, web platforms, eCommerce, customized inventory systems and also developed in excel, integration with different APIs in their applications, payment gateways, data storage structure, console applications. Various alternatives for every need the client may have.
SEO: The positioning on the web is very important in this era where the digitalization of business reigns, that is why I have dedicated myself to taking courses to give my clients the opportunity to stand out on the web, through various SEO strategies.
